title: Katie Price's son Harvey brings cute factor to Loose Women as they make their own Oscars-style gaffe

Harvey Price sent an adorable message to his mum after being presented with an award on Loose Women . 
The ITV show's panel - Ruth Langsford, Katie Price , Jane Moore and Stacey Solomon - kicked off the show by having their own version of the Academy Awards. 
After talking about THAT embarrassing gaffe that saw La La Land announced as the Best Picture winner instead of Moonlight, the Loose Women began handing out their own awards, which they dubbed Loscars. Harvey Price accepted a special award from his mum (Photo: ITV/Twitter) 
But they suffered their own mistake - oh, the perils of live TV. Read More Fans praise "beautiful" and "radiant" Lisa Riley as she unveils post-surgery look on Loose Women Harvey was named Katie's Best Supporting Male (Photo: MissKatiePrice/Twitter) 
Katie was announcing who she was going to name Best Supporting Male in her life, telling her fellow panelists that there are a lot of men in her life to choose from. 
But before she had the chance to announce it was her eldest son Harvey, 14, who was picking up the gong, his name flashed up on the screen. 
Eagle-eyed viewers noticed the mistake, with one taking to Twitter to say: "So @l oosewomen also makes a loscar booboo by showing Harvey's name before Katie announced it Must be something about awards this week!" 
The sweet moment wasn't ruined though. Harvey's name appeared on the screen before Katie announced him as the winner (Photo: ITV) 
A short video was played of Harvey accepting his award and making a speech. 
He said: "Hey, thank you for Loose Women for award. Thank you mummy for everything, love you so much." 
He then blew a kiss to the camera. 
Viewers couldn't handle how cute he was. He thanked his mum for everything (Photo: MissKatiePrice/Twitter) 
One posted: "So cute on @loosewomen @MissKatiePrice giving Harvey an award! I could squeeze him" 
"aww Love Harvey. His videos always make me smile. How people can be mean about him is disgusting x," said another. 
The Loose Women went on to attempt their own spoof of the moment Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway announced the wrong winner. 
Stacey's boyfriend Joe Swash began accepting a Loscar from her, before he was cut off mid-sentence and told there had been a mistake. 
It was actually the former X Factor star's sons, Zachary and Leighton, who had won the prize. Like us on Facebook
